articles.author: Kat Bailey
articles.title: You Can Buy a G.I. Joe H.I.S.S. Tank Toy With Working LED Lights For a Cool $300 - IGN
articles.description: Haslab has announced a crowdfunding campaign for a new $300 G.I. Joe H.I.S.S. Tank toy that includes LED lights, working treads, and more.
articles.content:
Haslab has revealed its latest project: an ultra high-quality version of G.I. Joe's H.I.S.S. Tank complete with battery-powered LED lights, removable armor, and more.
Available to backers for a cool… [+1018 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Leston
articles.title: Next James Bond Movie Will Be a 'Complete Reinvention' For the Series - IGN
articles.description: 007 producer Barbara Broccoli has promised the next Bond movie will be a "complete reinvention" of the series and that "nobody's in the running" for the role at the moment.
articles.content: 007s next outing will completely reinvent the James Bond series. According to producer Barbara Broccoli, the 26th Bond movie will reinvent who James Bond is but they havent found an actor to take up … [+1951 chars]
